advisory.synopsis: ansible-freeipa bug fix and enhancement update
advisory.topic: An update for ansible-freeipa is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisory.description: For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Rocky Linux 8.6 Release Notes linked from the References section.

fixes.description: [RFE] Add ability to run modules remotely

[ansible-freeipa] automember rebuild is missing from the automember module.
[ansible-freeipa] automember remove orphans group/hostgroup is missing from the automember module.
Rebase ansible-freeipa to a recent upstream release
[ansible-freeipa] Not able to update existing automember rule description.
[RFE] Add module to manage automount maps
